Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Addison
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Belmont, Oak Park, Irving Park and Harlem, due to fire department activity near Harlem/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Belmont, Oak Park, Irving Park, then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to fire department activity near Harlem/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
